description:
doc/go1: more package updates
Everything there (as first draft) except the time package.

messages.text: http://codereview.appspot.com/5487052/diff/1/doc/go1.html File doc/go1.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5487052/diff/1/doc/go1.html#newcode799 doc/go1.html:799: Instead, each operating system's os package provides a local each operating system that is unix? this sentence is confusing in the context of the example code. http://codereview.appspot.com/5487052/diff/1/doc/go1.html#newcode809 doc/go1.html:809: log.Fatal("hello.go:", err) I don't think you need the prefix here, err should contain the relevant detail.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

One sec.  It says "the http has been refactored"...

On Mon, Dec 12, 2011 at 5:48 PM, <adg@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**5487052/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5487052/>
>

http://codereview.appspot.com/5487052/diff/1005/doc/go1.html
File doc/go1.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5487052/diff/1005/doc/go1.html#newcode815
doc/go1.html:815: log.Fatal("hello.go: not a Unix file")
To me this implies that Stat under windows won't return an underlying *os.FileStat. This assertion should never fail if fi came from os.Stat. (Correct me if I'm wrong here.)

The message should be changed to reflect what's actually happened, maybe: "hello.go: not an os File"

http://codereview.appspot.com/5487052/diff/1005/doc/go1.html
File doc/go1.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5487052/diff/1005/doc/go1.html#newcode815
doc/go1.html:815: log.Fatal("hello.go: not a Unix file")
they all implement this type. it's just a bad error message.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5487052/diff/9/doc/go1.html File doc/go1.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5487052/diff/9/doc/go1.html#newcode644 doc/go1.html:644: The http is refactored, putting some missing word "package" ?

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c427a63226bf ***
